mapper.select: select g.giftnum, g.contnum,cnt,type,title, cultype,img,agegrade, gifthnum from gift g,webcontents w,(select giftnum,gifthnum from gifthistory gh, users u where u.usernum=gh.usernum and u.usernum=#{usernum}) gh where w.contnum=g.contnum and sysdate between startdate and enddate and g.giftnum=gh.giftnum(+) order by gifthnum desc, g.startdate desc
